data.marketing-software-title: Coworking Software — booking system, notices, membership, payments | andCards Suite
data.marketing-software-description: andCards Suite for Coworking Space Booking, Billing and Member Management
data.marketing-software-customers-mws-text: With andCards Suite we don't have any conflicting bookings anymore, because its booking system integrates external and internal orders. The booking system allows us to manage meeting rooms cost-efficiently. Also, I find andCards IoT integrations very promising for building a fully automated and unmanned coworking space.
data.marketing-software-customers-nipa-text: For our K-Startup Grand Challenge program we needed an efficient room booking system that allowed all teams to make bookings wherever they are, and enforce credit-based booking to regulate how many times each member can book a room. andCards Suite excels at both tasks.
data.marketing-software-main-headline: Ultimate Software Suite for Your Coworking Space
data.marketing-software-marketplace-title: Get more customers through andCards.com marketplace
data.marketing-software-marketplace-descripti: 📣 List your space on andCards.com to get new customers.
👑 Highlight your space with an eye-catching PLUS badge.
🎁 Convert customers with free trial and instant booking.
data.marketing-software-suite-title: Build coworking space community with andCards Suite
data.marketing-software-suite-description-1: 👩‍💻 Build community directory to let people discover each other.
data.marketing-software-suite-description-2: 💌 Keep members informed by sending them targeted notices.
data.marketing-software-booking-title: Get integrated meeting room booking system
data.marketing-software-booking-description-1: ⏳ No more booking conflicts: internal or external bookings are on the same timeline.
data.marketing-software-booking-description-2: ⭐️ Give room booking credits as a benefit to your members.
data.marketing-software-booking-description-3: 🔒 igloohome smart lock integration: people can enter the room with temporary password.

data.marketing-software-subscriptions-descrip: 💸 Desk or office — let customers pay easily through andCards Suite.
🔄 We'll automatically charge your customers on a monthly basis.
🌍 Invite new customers with free trials and instant bookings through andCards.com
